K10ratnakeu:637: brūhi mahākāruṇika vistareṇemaṃ pūrvayogaṃ katham asmākaṃ strībhāvam antarhitaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ ca puruṣabhāvaṃ saṃprāptam /

K10ratnakeu:662: keṣāṃcid raktāni vāsāṃsi prayacchati keṣāṃcit pāṇḍarāṇi /

K10ratnakeu:680: tebhyaś ca sattvebhya evaṃ dharman deśayām āsa /

K10ratnakeu:721: tataḥ pāpakadṛṣṭigatāt pratinivartyātyayaṃ pratideśāpayitvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati sma //

K10ratnakeu:734: maitreyaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tena kālena tena samayenābhūt /
K10ratnakeu:735: syāt khalu bhadramukhā yuṣmākaṃ kāṃkṣā vā vimatir vānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena kumārabhṛto nāma bhaṭo 'bhūt sārdhaṃ prāṇakoṭībhiḥ /
K10ratnakeu:736: (Kurumiya 50) na khalu punar yuṣmābhir evaṃ draṣṭavyam /

K10ratnakeu:739: yadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syāt tadā tvaṃ māṃ vyākuryād anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //

K10ratnakeu:745: tebhyaś ca dharmaṃ śrutvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritaṃ iti //
K10ratnakeu:746: tena yūyaṃ kāyavāṅmanoduścaritena karmaṇā pūrvaṃ tṛṣv apāyeṣv aneke kalpāḥ duḥkhāny anubhūtavantaḥ /

K10ratnakeu:749: teṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ mārakanyāśatānāṃ strībhāvam antardhāya puruṣabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtto 'nutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilaṃbhāś cābhūvan /

K10ratnakeu:753: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ devamānuṣyakanyānāṃ mātṛgrāmabhāvo vinivṛttaḥ puruṣabhāvāśrayapratilābhaś cābhūt // //
K10ratnakeu:756: atha khalv asyāṃ ratnaketudhāraṇyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śākyamuninā tathāgatenaitarhi sarvāvatīyaṃ sahālokadhātur udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭābhūt /
K10ratnakeu:757: yac ceha buddhakṣetre koṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ teṣu koṭīśataṃ kāmeśvarāṇāṃ māratvaṃ kārayaṃti /
K10ratnakeu:758: te buddhānubhāvena saṃvignā imāṃ cāturdvīpikāṃ vyavalokayaṃti sma /

K10ratnakeu:761: atha khalu te mārā vyavalokayanto 'drākṣuḥ taṃ māraṃ pāpīmantaṃ śokāgāre niṣaṇṇaṃ paramadurmanasthaṃ //
K10ratnakeu:762: atha tat koṭīśataṃ mārāṇāṃ yeneyaṃ cāturdvīpikā yena mārasya pāpīmato bhavanaṃ tenopajagāmopetya māraṃ pāpīmantam evam āha /
K10ratnakeu:763: kiṃ bho kāmeśvara sarvāvatīyaṃ lokadhātur avabhāsitā tvaṃ ca śokāgāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ //
K10ratnakeu:765: atha kāmeśvaro māras teṣāṃ mārakoṭīśatānāṃ vistareṇārocayati sma /

K10ratnakeu:767: tenotpannamātreṇa sarvāvatīyaṃ sahālokadhātur avabhāsitā prakaṃpitā kṣobhitā /
